ul_574366: ssh-add -l

$ ssh-add -l
2048 SHA256:rzgw39XLAT0NHof4RBXFU/ahKhFWlH8FqMgNxBX2SAE /home/me/.ssh/id_rsa (RSA)

$ ssh-add -d /home/me/.ssh/id_rsa
Identity removed: /home/me/.ssh/id_rsa (me@ubnutu-vm)

$ ssh-add -D
All identities removed.

Explanations about Options.-D: Deletes all identities from the agent.
Explanations about Options.-L: Lists public key parameters of all identities currently represented by the agent.
